item.title: News
item.description: 2019 13-Feb-2019 Presenting our Cross-lingual-NER paper on AAAI-2020. 14-Dec-2019 Got AAAI-2020 travel scholarship. See you in New York. 11-Nov-2019 A paper accepted on AAAI 2020. 11-Nov-2019 A paper accepted on AAAI 2020. 15-Jun-2019 A paper accepted on ACL 2019. 25-Jan-2019 Shows MT system to industry and government stakeholders. 15-Jan-2019 Joins NTU-NLP lab as a PhD student.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.
